Has anyone else used the old ghetto Kool Aid as hair dye technique? How did you prepare it? What colour or flavour did you use? What were the results? Have you tried mixing colours/flavours?

I used 2 packets of cherry mixed with conditioner and left it in for about 8 hours. My result was a dark orange-red. I think I'm going to try again adding just a little blue in with it to (hopefully) take out the orange tones.


Has anyone tried using RIT dye on hair? How did that go?

Stolen from x_its_a_dream_x

Feel free to tell me something about yourself, whatever you want! It's all up to you. all comments/spam will be visible to everyone. Even Comment many times in a row!! Seriously Anything!! This is the cutest and strangest thing I have ever seen! Small things amuse me, yes.

http://www.youtube.com/v/OeNggIGSKH8


I thought for sure it had to be fake. It looks like a toy. According to Wikipedia, though, it's a Megalopyge opercularis. How completely adorable! I would probably be one of those people to try to pick it up and pet it. LOL

Hope it's a good one!

Just a heads up to everyone in the area:

It seems a guy is going around scamming places in the St Catharines area. He pays with a $50 bill and then asks to buy it back for two twenties and a ten, continues to "make change" in several different ways to confuse the cashier and then walks out leaving the cashier short. This has happened to three people I know so far!!! (This guy's lucky I'm not a cashier, I'd kill him if I was short in my till!) I know in some places till shortages come out of a cashier's wages, so please be careful! If you encounter this guy trying the scam, get a manager over and call the police.

People suck.

If I find one more dead baby bird around here I'm going to... well... clean it up I guess...

It seems there was a nest in our ceiling and when the young birds started trying to fly they found a hole in our heater room and in turn found the cats. o.0 Upon coming home from work last night I found parts of four young birds. It seems the cats didn't like the feet. I didn't even realize said hole was there as it's not very large and is in the heater room.

I'm sitting here, quickly checking email before returning to my game and The Day Before You Came by Blancmange is playing in the background. I notice the lyrics say "...I must have gone to bed around a quarter after ten..." and I glance at the clock which reads exactly 10:15. Ok, not that weird, but pretty strangerrific, says I.

Taken from a thread in 's journal and posted by re the filming of Whorenun on the roof of the old nunnery beside a highway: "911 whats your emergency?" "Yeah, I'm driving along (insert name of highway here) and I'm passing buy the old nunnery and there may or may not be a nun on the roof about to commit suicide" "May or may not? Is she there or isn't she?" " NO no no , there's definitely someone there..I'm just not sure if she's a nun or not....I think she might be a goth nun" "a goth nun?" " Yeah, I mean she's dressed like a nun..but..she has piercings and the make up is not right for a nun" "mmmm hmm" "Oh yeah and I saw her throw a baby out the window earlier" " she threw a baby out the window?" "yes" "Ok so let me get this straight, there is a Baby throwing, goth nun standing on the roof of the old nunnery about to commit suicide" "Yes, thats right" "Have you been drinking tonight sir?" "No" Taken any illegal or prescription drugs?" "No" "Well sir , I think you should pull over to the side of the road and the police will be there shortly to help you" "You mean the goth nun" "Yes sir...the..um...goth nun" Hee, that cracked me up. I had to share.

...makes me feel and not myself. Sailling through the tunnels In the morning by yourself There's a very special feeling True sensation all is well If you stand and reach your arms out wide Close your eyes and try to fly It's an underground illusion Tricking you from side to side We knew all the answers And we shouted them like anthems Anxious and suspicious That God knew how much we cheated It can't come quickly enough And now you've spent your life Waiting for this moment And when you finally saw it come It passed you by and left you so defeated Skyscrapers rise between us Keeping me from finding you If the concrete architecture Dissapeared there'd be so few Of us left to navigate and Defend ourselves from the tide It's an underground illusion Tricking you from side to side There's no indication of What we were meant to be Sucking up to strangers Throwing wishes to the sea It can't come quickly enough And now you've spent your life Waiting for this moment And when you finally saw it come It passed you by and Left you so defeated Not been on much lately due to working too damn hard on a project.

We all have the power to hurt someone. To lower someone's self-esteem, their self-worth, to say something to have them questioning themselves. The internet makes this even easier. It's a much greater power, however, to choose not to say petty, vehement or negative things and greater still to take that energy and redirect it in the form of a positive comment to someone who may need it.

The internet seems to have become more a source of negativity than most high schools.

Me = bored. Playing on this site... frazy.com? I donno, seems ok, I guess. Was looking for some fun new meme or quiz but no such luck.



    Wisdom is what's left after we've run out of personal opinions.

    -- Cullen Hightower 


Now if only we ever ran out of personal opinions.

Your Blog Should Be Purple
You're an expressive, offbeat blogger who tends to write about anything and everything. You tend to set blogging trends, and you're the most likely to write your own meme or survey. You are a bit distant though. Your blog is all about you - not what anyone else has to say.
What Color Should Your Blog or Journal Be?

June 12: In the backyard with Lacey
June 14: At the abandoned nunnery, New City SubUrbs show-Profunda Rosa We got dressed up in this abandoned nunnery and took some pictures and even made a little movie.
Profunda Rosa show at the New City SubUrbs
June 17: Out for a Walk then hanging out at home with Lacey and Mya
June 19: To Yelena's parents' house for lunch, then the flight home :(
( made my awesome shirt featuring Marilyn Manson as Christina in Party Monster with the quote "How do you like my UFO?") With my brother! With Otis Take-off
So that's about it. A lot of the time I didn't think to take pics but we did get these ones. It was lots of fun.

Tattoo Survey


01..how many tattoos do you have?
Just 4 for now

02..when did you get your first tattoo?
I think I was 18.

03..what was your first tattoo?
A piece of flash... a celtic stone dragon on my lower back.

04..which tattoo is closest to your heart (not in a literal sense)?
The "Spidey" on the back of my neck. It keeps my brother nearby at all times.

05..do you have a matching tattoo with someone?
Sort of. The same flash I got done, a highschool "friend" went out and got after seeing it and in the exact same location.

06..do you have a tattoo that someone fucked up?
Sort of. The one on my chest is crooked and the Mog on my ankle spread slightly so now you can't see his eyes properly. Nothing too tremendously bad.

07..do you have anyone's name tattooed on you?
God no.

08..what was the most painful tattoo you received?
I guess the one on my chest. Right in the center it was burning a little.

09..have you ever cried during a tattoo?
No. Giggled, yes.

10..have you ever had to have a tattoo artist stop in the middle?
Nope

11..do you have a tattoo that you constantly have to explain to people because no one can tell what the hell it is?
Usually just the Mog one because he's a character that most people aren't really familiar with.

12..have you ever gotten an infection from a tattoo?
Nope

13..what is the longest session you've ever sat straight through?
Probably either the dragon or the chest piece. Neither one was very long. Maybe two hours tops.

14..what is the biggest tattoo that you have and how long did it take?
See previous q.

15..have you ever gotten a tattoo of something just because it was funny or shocking?
I always have a sense of humour when it comes to my tattoos. Especially my cute little spidey and my little Mog.

16..do you have any unfinished projects on you right now?
None

17..what is the most you've ever spent on a tattoo?
No clue. Don't remember how much any of them were except the spidey.

18..has anyone (i.e. parents or girlfriend/boyfriend) gotten pissed at you when you got a tattoo?
Probably my dad. I didn't ask.

19..do you have any tattoos in places that most people don't get to see unless they see you naked?
Well, I don't usually walk around with my lower back showing, but I guess that's not all that private an area...

20..do you have any people tattooed on you?
Nope

21..are you worried about what your tattoos will look like when you get old?
Nope. Everything gets uglier with age.

22..do you regret having gotten any of your tattoos?
Hell no.

23..would you consider ever getting any of your tattoos removed?
Nope.

24..i know this is a hard one, but what is your favorite tattoo?
Spidey

25..what are you going to get for your next tattoo?
I think the little bat/spiderweb heart I designed.

26..do you realize that tribal, kanji, and barbed wire are the absolute most stupid tattoos that a person can get?
Every tattoo imaginable has been done to death so in theory every tattoo is the "absolute most stupid tattoo a person can get". Tattoos are personal. If someone's getting a tattoo just because it's trendy then no matter what the tattoo is it's still going to suck.

27..what words do you have tattooed on you?
None

28..which tattoo do other people seem to like the most on you?
I donno. Never asked anyone.
Doin my part, despite my absence. Much love to all of you, everywhere.
